content: अष्टिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [अस्यते भूमौ क्षिप्यते अस्-क्तिन् पृषो° षत्वं] {@--1@} A die for playing. {@--2@} A metre consisting of sixty-four syllables. {@--3@} [अक्ष्-व्याप्तौ-क्तिन्] Pervasion, reaching (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--4@} The body (the instrument of enjoyment). {@--5@} The number sixteen. {@--6@} Seed. {@--7@} Kernel.
